title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.122 - Extraordinary expense
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.122 - Extraordinary expense

State Regulations
A material expense (see materiality) so unusual in nature
or in frequency of occurrence as to be accorded special treatment in the
accounts or separate disclosure in financial statements. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.122

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
